description: Studio Founders Chris Ward and JD Slater are pleased to presentsuperstar discovery Huessein. Not since the time of the legendaryBruno has a man so stunning appeared in gay erotica.Huessein is a bodybuilder who lives in Germany, but he gets his hairygood looks from his Turkish background. Do not miss out on his debutperformance, coupled with another classic Kristen Bjorn heart-throb -Ivan Andros. So much hair! So many muscles! Two cannonball assesand two of the biggest cocks you will ever see! Pairings like this arewhat make Raging Stallion Studios the leader in macho manerotica!
title: Studs
